client_id.description: ClientID is the AAD Application client id. It's needed when type is service principal or user managed identity

federated_token_file.description: FederatedTokenFile is the path to the file containing the federated token. It's needed when type is workload_identity.

tenant_id.description: TenantID is the tenand id for the AAD App. It's only needed when type is service principal.

type.description: Type is the authentication type. supported values are connection_string, service_principal, system_managed_identity and user_managed_identity

blob_name_format.description: BlobNameFormat is the format of the blob name. It controls the uploaded blob name, e.g. "2006/01/02/metrics_15_04_05.json"

container.description: A container organizes a set of blobs, similar to a directory in a file system.

enabled.description: Enabled indicates whether to not retry sending batches in case of export failure.

encodings.description: Encoding extension to apply for logs/metrics/traces. If present, overrides the marshaler configuration option and format.

format.description: FormatType is the format of encoded telemetry data. Supported values are json and proto.

multiplier.description: Multiplier is the value multiplied by the backoff interval bounds

randomization_factor.description: RandomizationFactor is a random factor used to calculate next backoffs Randomized interval = RetryInterval * (1 ± RandomizationFactor)

url.description: URL is the endpoint to the azure storage account. This is only required until there is an azure auth extension in the future.
